name: THE LOOP OF DEATH
description:
You are stuck in a loop. Evil robots are trying to kill you. Try to survive for as long as you can. Collect shields and medkits in order to reheal. And try to collect all the guns.

TIP: If you collect two of the same gun you will receive an golden version of that gun.

Controls:

Walk WASD.

Aim and shoot with mouse.

Swap guns with left control.

Pickup guns with E.

Have Fun!

Programmer: Christiaan Mostert

Artist: Eben Mostert
